item.title: Version 0.1.0
item.description:
What's New

Important

  • Cliparoo is becoming Clipgrep - This is the final release of Cliparoo. We're rebranding to Clipgrep with a fresh new identity!

New Feature

  • Migration export tool - Export your clipboard history and settings to seamlessly migrate to Clipgrep. A migration dialog will appear on launch, or access it anytime in Settings > About > Data & Migration.

Migration Instructions

  1. Click "Export Data" in the migration dialog
  2. Download Clipgrep from clipgrep.app
  3. In Clipgrep, go to Settings and import your exported file

Notes

  • The migration reminder will appear on launch and hourly until you export
  • Click "Remind Later" to snooze the reminder
  • Your export file will be saved to ~/Documents/cliparoo-migration.json
